Question: Similarly, this person kept at Monticello an engraving of Maria done by Luigi Schiavonetti, from a drawing by Richard Cosway.
Hints: Shortly before leaving office, in March 1809, this person signed the repeal of the disastrous Embargo.
Louis Leschot, a machinist, aided this person with the clock.
Construction was done mostly by local masons and carpenters, assisted by this person's slaves.
